descriptionHtml:
UPDATE!!! I made a new version that will NOT replace the original armor!!!

UPDATE AGAIN!!! I added a new optional file that removes the red glow. It only works with version 2 and make sure you overwrite the original files or else it won\'t work.

UPDATE AGAIN AGAIN!!! You can now find a matching pink daedric sword on my profile.

Pink Daedric Armor v. 2
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This version of the mod will create a whole new armor called \"Pink Daedric Armor\" and will not replace the original daedric armor.

Installation: Just drag the files into your data folder and make sure to activate the .esp!!!

You can smith this armor at a forge but you will need to have the daedric smithing perk.

It requires the same as the daedric armor does. (2 leather strips, 3 ebony ingots, 1 daedra heart)

Alternatively, you can find the item code by opening the console (tilde button ~) and typing: help \"pink daedric armor\" 4

INCLUDING the quotation marks AND the number 4. Change \"armor\" to boots, gauntlets, helmet, or shield depending on which one you want.

This will show you the item code number. Then type: player.additem (item code) (the amount of items you want)

NOT INCLUDING the parenthesis.

NOTE: in the inventory screen it will look normal. I don\'t know how to fix this yet, sorry. :(

Thank you for downloading ^_^
author: puppyhugger
